entries.npc_11: I worry about the universe sometimes...and this is why.
entries.npc_10: Well, keep it to yourself, that's my advice.  People don't like a tough guy unless they need one.  Or unless they really are bad people.
entries.npc_5: That's a bit negative isn't it?  Surely you're just saying that to sound tough...
entries.npc_9: Well, I'm just a silly old man sometimes.  But don't look at people too negatively.  Sometimes they can surprise you.
entries.npc_8: I hope so.  But I also hope for the best all the time.
entries.npc_4: You're probably the better man for it.  Me, I just can't think of people negatively until they've done something to lose my trust.
entries.npc_3: Until they prove otherwise.  Don't you?
entries.player_4: Well, thanks.  That's nice of you.
entries.npc_2: Probably not.  Just being friendly is all.
entries.player_2: Do you assume everyone's a friend?
